articles.title: India at Asian Games 2023, Day 12 schedule: Shuttlers in quarterfinal action, Ghosal eyes squash gold, women’s hockey semifinal, compound archers look to impress again - The Indian Express
articles.description: Here are the main Indian events to track on Day 12 of the Asian Games (Thursday)
articles.content: Neeraj Chopra delivered once again on what was yet another rich-medal haul day, as India set a new record for their best ever medal tally at the Asian Games. As we reach the business end of the event… [+2762 chars]

articles.title: Neeraj Chopra addresses umpiring howler in men's javelin final at Asian Games - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The error led to major confusion as Neeraj had to wait for quite some time before being asked to retake his first attempt.
articles.content: India's golden boy Neeraj Chopra continued his supreme show and won a gold medal in the 19th Asian Games in Hangzhou, China on Wednesday. The star javelin thrower bagged the top position with a gigan… [+2572 chars]

articles.title: Hangzhou Asian Games: India enter men's hockey final with hard-fought 5-3 win over South Korea - Times of India
articles.description: Asian Games 2023 News: India defeated South Korea 5-3 in a hard-fought semifinal to enter the title clash of the men's hockey competition at the Asian Games in Hangzhou on W

articles.title: Ripple obtains full license to operate in Singapore as it expands in Asia-Pacific - CNBC
articles.description: Ripple said on Wednesday that it has obtained a full license to operate in Singapore, a strategic step toward growing its presence in the Asia-Pacific region.
articles.content:
Brad Garlinghouse, chief executive officer of Ripple Labs Inc.,speaks during the Token2049 conference in Singapore, on Wednesday, Sept. 13, 2023.
